english.segment1: Welcome to the planet. Welcome to exsistance. Everyones here. Everyones here. Everyones watching you now. Everybody waits for you now. What happens next. What happens next
english.segment2: I dare you to move. I dare you to move. I dare you to lift yourself up off the floor. I dare you to move. I dare you to move like the day never happened. Today never happened before
english.segment3: Welcome to the fallout. Welcome to resistance. The tension is here. The tension is here
english.segment4: Between who you are and who you could be. Between how it is and how it should be
english.segment5: I dare you to move. I dare you to move. I dare you to lift yourself up off the floor. I dare you to move. I dare you to move like the day never happened. Today never happened
english.segment6: Maybe redemption has stories to tell. Maybe forgiveness is right where you fell. Where can you run to escape from yourself. Where you gonna go. Where you gonna go
english.segment8: I dare you to move. I dare you to move. I dare you to lift yourself up off the floor. I dare you to move. I dare you to move like the day never happened. Today never happened. Today never happened. Today never happened. Today never happened before
